mapper.sql: hour, share_accept AS shareAccept, share_reject AS shareReject, reject_rate AS rejectRate, score, earn, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt
mapper.select: SELECT hour, share_accept, share_reject, reject_rate, score, earn, created_at, updated_at FROM stats_pool_hour
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stats_pool_hour (hour, share_accept, share_reject, reject_rate, score, earn, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{hour}, #{shareAccept}, #{shareReject}, #{rejectRate}, #{score}, #{earn}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})

INSERT INTO stats_pool_hour (hour, share_accept, share_reject, reject_rate, score, earn, created_at, updated_at) VALUES
(#{item.hour}, #{item.shareAccept}, #{item.shareReject}, #{item.rejectRate}, #{item.score}, #{item.earn}, #{item.createdAt}, #{item.updatedAt})
mapper.update:
UPDATE stats_pool_hour
share_accept=#{shareAccept},
share_reject=#{shareReject},
reject_rate=#{rejectRate},
score=#{score},
earn=#{earn},
created_at=#{createdAt},
updated_at=#{updatedAt},
WHERE hour = #{hour}
